snippet: Mayor Rob Ford of Toronto decided not to try to officially enter the United States shortly after flying there on Thursday, hours after saying he would take a leave of absence to seek treatment.
abstract: Mayor Rob Ford of Toronto 'voluntarily withdraws' an application to enter the United States after flying to Chicago, and was not denied entry as reported; episode follows announcement that he will take a leave of absence from his job to seek treatment for an alcohol problem.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Rob Ford of Toronto decided not to try to officially enter the United States shortly after flying there on Thursday, hours after saying he would take a leave of absence to seek treatment.

headline.main: Canada: Mayor Ford Flew to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Canada: Mayor Ford Flew to U.S.
